subject: This File Is Hard to dismiss as actual communication
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_47880.314cafb7.38f369b5_boundary

	boundary="part1_47880.314cafb7.38f369b5_alt_boundary"


--part1_47880.314cafb7.38f369b5_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


I asked a specific question about the latest box i'm building.  My  
question was simple and to the point "Is it the board or the radio that's  causing 
the problem?"
 
The answer came seconds after asking it.  It was an intelligent  response 
to my question.  I would like for someone to comment of this with  the 
explanation of how they did that.  I just know they speak to me and i  don't know 
how they do it.  There is still so much to learn about this  field.
 
-Steve H.
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/)
